FuncDef: This command configures the RX/TX cookie for L2TPv3 spoke SDPs for Epipe services. The RX cookie must match the configured TX cookie on a far-end node, while the TX cookie must match the configured RX cookie on a far-end node. If a mismatch is detected between the configured (far-end binding cookie) to what is received by the local IP address of the SDP a flag is set and must be manually cleared by an operator.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the first cookie, in the form of a 64-bit colon-separated hex value.
Specifies the second cookie, in the form of a 64-bit colon-separated hex value.
